The general formula for the probability density function of the normal distribution with mean $\mu$ and variance $\sigma$ is given by

$$
f_X(x) = \frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{(2\pi)}} e^{-(x-\mu)^2/2\sigma^2}.
$$
